verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> of degrees אַ֭שְׁרֵי <WH835> Blessed כָּל־ <WH3605> is everyone יְרֵ֣א <WH3373> [is] every one that feareth יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God הַ֝הֹלֵ֗ךְ <WH1980> that walketh בִּדְרָכָֽיו׃ <WH1870> in his ways

יְגִ֣יעַ <WH3018> the labour כַּ֭פֶּיךָ <WH3709> of thine hands כִּ֣י <WH3588> When תֹאכֵ֑ל <WH398> For thou shalt eat אַ֝שְׁרֶ֗יךָ <WH835> happy וְט֣וֹב <WH2896> [shalt] thou [be] and [it shall be] well לָֽךְ׃

אֶשְׁתְּךָ֤ ׀ <WH802> Thy wife כְּגֶ֥פֶן <WH1612> vine פֹּרִיָּה֮ <WH6509> [shall be] as a fruitful בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֪י <WH3411> by the sides בֵ֫יתֶ֥ךָ <WH1004> of thine house בָּ֭נֶיךָ <WH1121> thy children כִּשְׁתִלֵ֣י <WH8363> plants זֵיתִ֑ים <WH2132> like olive סָ֝בִ֗יב <WH5439> round about לְשֻׁלְחָנֶֽךָ׃ <WH7979> thy table
הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold כִי־ <WH3588> for כֵ֭ן <WH3651> thus יְבֹ֥רַךְ <WH1288> be blessed גָּ֗בֶר <WH1397> Behold that thus shall the man יְרֵ֣א <WH3373> that feareth יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

יְבָרֶכְךָ֥ <WH1288> shall bless יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD מִצִּ֫יּ֥וֹן <WH6726> thee out of Zion וּ֭רְאֵה <WH7200> and thou shalt see בְּט֣וּב <WH2898> the good יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem כֹּ֝֗ל <WH3605> all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> all the days חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2416> of thy life
וּרְאֵֽה־ <WH7200> Yea thou shalt see בָנִ֥ים <WH1121> thy children's לְבָנֶ֑יךָ <WH1121> children שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <WH7965> [and] peace עַל־ <WH5921> be upon יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> upon Israel
